description: The High Impact Biofilter directly filters emissions from large industrial processes that produce high volumes of pollution. This biofiltration system is designed to treat industrial emissions of Sox, CO, CO², Nox and fine particles 2.5-10 pm. Projects must be tailored to the specifications and size of the plant and its emissions.

name: HISONG SuperMic S1
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories
description: HISONG 3-in-1 SuperMic S1The S1 offers a groundbreaking, truly wireless, and portable audio workstation. Leveraging highly innovative and patented wireless audio technologies, it seamlessly integrates three essential functions—microphone, audio mixer, and earphones—into a single solution. This integration enhances both efficiency and convenience, representing a major advancement in the audio industry.The microphone features proprietary acoustic structures and algorithms, enabling effortless switching among multi-directional pickup patterns (cardioid, supercardioid, etc.) via a distributed microphone system.The built-in audio mixer is equipped with a powerful DSP (Digital Signal Processor) for complex floating-point calculations.The monitoring earphones utilize the latest LE AUDIO wireless technology.Furthermore, when paired with the HISONG LINK app, the S1 provides professional-grade vocal fine-tuning capabilities with a built-in EQ (Equalizer).With its exceptional hardware and software solution, the HISONG S1 delivers truly one-of-a-kind performance for live streaming, recording, music creation, or everyday listening and singing.

name: HL HAECHIE
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All
description: HL HAECHIE is an innovative device that detects ultraviolet radiation emitted during arc occurrences, which are a primary cause of electrical fires. By accurately sensing UV-C with advanced semiconductor technology, it enables electrical fires to be detected early and prevented without malfunctions. HL HAECHIE's wide detection range, compact size, and easy installation mean it can be applied to both small electronic devices and large electrical systems. In an increasingly electrified world, it introduces a new paradigm in fire prevention, providing a safer environment.

name: HOLODISPLAY FLOATING SCREEN
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Smart Home

name: Holographic Extended Reality (HXR) platform
description: Swave’s Holographic eXtended Reality (HXR) is the world’s first true holographic display technology that sculpts and steers light to form high-resolution 3D images. HXR establishes a new kind of advanced display technology, producing the world’s smallest pixel with a pixel pitch of less than 300nm. The low-cost CMOS chip technology will enable AI-powered spatial computing for compact smart glasses and other XR form factors. The technology will provide a reality-first user experience, where digital elements complement, learn from, and interact with the physical world. Use cases will be vast, including healthcare, manufacturing, logistics, retail, communication, gaming, education, automotive and aerospace.

name: Holographic Transparent Camera
description: Introducing the Holographic Transparent Camera, a groundbreaking product that revolutionizes the way images and videos are captured. With its technical holographic optical element, Holographic Transparent Camera transforms any transparent part into a camera, seamlessly integrating camera functionality without compromising transparency or aesthetics. Users no longer need traditional camera devices, as Holographic Transparent Camera provides integrated camera functionality, enhancing overall user experience and eliminating the need for additional equipment. The sleek and minimalistic design of Holographic Transparent Camera enhances the appearance of electronic devices and offers centered imaging and eye-tracking capabilities.

name: Home MediCare Bed 2.0 with AI Health Concierge
description: The Home MediCare Bed 2.0 with AI Health Concierge is a medical bed designed for personalized health management. It features a spinal thermal massage module, AI-driven voice control for enhanced accessibility, and a modular bed frame with integrated sensors for vital sign monitoring. The bed supports telemedicine, enabling real-time connection with medical staff, and offers customizable light and aromatherapy options for enhanced sleep and psychological comfort.

name: HomePlunge
description: HomePlunge is a cold plunge system designed for the home bathtub.Only a few cold plunge products actually look good yet they burden the user with large space requirements due to the integrated water tank. HomePlunge's patent pending design is made for the water tank you already have, your bathtub. Other products have maintenance protocols that rival a pool and user experiences that lack simplicity and privacy. HomePlunge maintenance is simple: drain you tub and refill. Enjoy a cold plunge in the privacy of your bathroom and easily improve your daily routine with the convenience of HomePlunge.

name: Hormometer™️
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Digital Health

name: HOVERAir Beacon
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories
description: The Beacon, together with two detachable Joystick sub-components, features a patented Tri-state modular design that provides three-way joystick experiences when using HOVERAir X1 series flying camera. When used as a standalone device, Beacon activates HoverLink™ for high-precise tracking and offers up to a 1 km video transmission range. The 1.78" OLED display allows users to monitor camera footage without needing to look back and it supports AI-powered noise-cancellation sound recording. Users can also transform it into a one-handed controller or a two-handed full-featured controller.

name: HP AI Companion
description: HP AI Companion is a generative AI software designed to enhance productivity and streamline tasks. HP AI Companion integrates a collection of AI tools and solutions into a seamless user experience that can summarize long articles, generate content, and answer user queries using natural language processing, along with optimizing PC performance. It is your personal AI assistant, helping you get more done efficiently in a way that is simple and intuitive. As the functionality evolves, users will have the ability to interact with their assistant using voice and even the ability to customize their AI experience with local language models.

name: HP OmniBook Ultra Flip 14 inch Next Gen AI PC
description: The OmniBook Ultra Flip 14” 2-in-1 Laptop is a next-gen AI PC designed for optimal power and portability, offering up to 21 hours of battery life with a Z height of 14.9mm and a weight of 1.349kg. It can operate at 45 TOPS with an Intel Lunar Lake processor . It features a 9MP IR AI camera, 3K OLED display with touch, and an all-new keyboard design. It is also designed with a focus on sustainability, featuring recycled and sustainable materials in the product and packaging, making it a powerful, versatile, and responsible choice for modern users.

name: HP Z Captis
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Computer Peripherals & Accessories
description: The HP Z Captis is the world’s first digital material capture system integrated with Adobe Substance 3D. It uses a type of 3D imaging, called photometry, to capture virtually any material and render it digitally. Powered by an embedded NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier system-on-module and HP’s Capture Management SDK, 3D creators can sample and remix reality through direct integration with Adobe Substance 3D Sampler, revolutionizing material digitization across industries including architecture, automotive, entertainment, fashion, and gaming

name: Humming Blocks
description: Humming Blocks is an innovative music-driven platform, accessible to all creators, including digitally marginalized groups. This groundbreaking system empowers users to combine music arrangement with coding concepts. Uniquely configured for the visually impaired, the 20 instrument and logic blocks are tactilely distinct so they can be assembled without visual input. By capturing these blocks with the app, users can easily translate their physical arrangements into digital code and music, creating an immersive and inclusive experience. Humming Blocks redefine digital entertainment, offering a multisensory journey that fuses creativity, coding, and music, making it enjoyable and accessible for all ages and abilities.

name: HyperGrid NX
company: LS ELECTRIC Co., Ltd., LS Cable & System Ltd.
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All, Smart Cities
description: The HyperGrid NX is a superconducting power system that sets a new standard for next-generation power delivery, offering high-capacity transmission with improved reliability and protection. This was jointly developed by LS ELECTRIC Co., Ltd. and LS Cable & System Ltd.. The HyperGrid NX is an optimal solution for large power consumers, such as urban data centers and advanced industrial complexes. It minimizes the need for power grid expansion and construction, reducing both construction time and costs, while preventing damage from power outages or fires. Furthermore, there are no electromagnetic wave emissions and transmission losses during power transmission, enhancing the acceptance of transmission and transformation facilities in densely populated urban areas and contributing to carbon emission reduction.

name: Hypershell Carbon X
description: Hypershell Carbon X is the first outdoor exoskeleton in the world. It combines state-of-the-art robotics, ergonomics, and AI into a compact form to enable users to go further and enjoy the splendor of the nature. It features by powerful assistance, senseless wear, and durability. It is equipped with self-developed M-One exoskeleton motor system which can output an assistive power up to 800W smoothly to reduce users’ physical exertion. Its revolutionary and ultra-light ergonomic design ensures an unparalleled level of comfort. Its AI MotionEngine algorithm detects movements and shifts among 10 assistance modes in real time to provide precise support.

name: IDPS (Independently Derived Positioning System)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility

name: IL1A-AI based olfactory digital sniffer dog system
description: Digital sniffer dog system is the world’s first product that can detect whether to possess drugs or not based on smell. This innovative product prevents drug smuggling in airports by capturing air of entrant’s body or baggage with olfactory AI technology.This product captures the air around the entrant with a full-scale inspection and converts the result into digital olfactory data with multi-channel gas sensor arrays. AI systems automatically compare the data with the drug olfactory DB to decide whether there is a drug.Also, it will be a game changer for the enhancement of human security and social stab

name: IM_Pathfinder_Navi
description: IM_Pathfinder_Navi is a next-generation robotic intervention system designed to treat critical vascular diseases such as thrombosis, myocardial infarction, and stroke - among the leading causes of global mortality. This innovative system provides easy, fast, and precise 3D steering of magnetic guidewires through its advanced magnetic field control, significantly reducing procedure time. Shorter procedures not only minimize patient radiation exposure but also enable quicker recovery. Medical staff can operate the system remotely using controls like a 3D mouse or joystick, allowing them to perform surgeries from a separate area and reducing their radiation exposure to nearly zero.

name: IMMERSIO™ XE50 Battery System
description: Designed for energy storage system, the IMMERSIO™ XE50 Battery System revolutionizes battery performance by immersing cells in dielectric fluid for coolant for efficient cooling. With precise temperature control within 3% and an innovative structural design, the system extends battery life by 15% and saves approximately 40% in space and weight, thereby reducing operational costs. Additionally, it overcomes the safety and temperature limitations of lithium batteries, enabling energy storage system deployment from urban environments to extreme climates, and accelerating the energy transition.

name: In-Mold Structural Electronics (IMSE®)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: In-mold structural electronics (IMSE®) is a technology platform that integrates electronics, mechanics and cosmetics within a single-piece, seamless, 3D injection molded part. IMSE parts re light weight, thin, and durable, they also reduce complexity by replacing multi-part conventional electronics assemblies. Circuitry, touch controls, proximity sensors, antennas, and lighting are common features in IMSE designs. Surface treatments include cosmetic plastics and natural materials, including wood veneer. Even with integrated lighting, IMSE parts can be as thin as 3mm and conform to complex shapes supporting unprecedented design freedom for incorporating electronic features in vehicle interiors and exteriors.

name: Infinity Football XR
description: Infinity Football XR by Blockchain Sports XR is a fresh take on traditional football, pushing its boundaries with new game mechanics and advanced technology.

name: INIU Leopard Power Station 40K
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps

name: Innovative Hair Loss Diagnostic System, Hair Scale, AFS 3D
description: AFS 3D is a groundbreaking device for precise hair loss diagnosis, setting a new standard in the field. It uses 360-degree rotational imaging and AI analysis to accurately assess follicle conditions. The device features automatic focus adjustment and a simple one-click capture process for ease of use. Adjustable internal lighting ensures consistent imaging conditions, enhancing data reliability. The innovation in traditional hair transplant surgeries and hair loss treatments reduces unnecessary medical expenses, improving the well-being of individuals suffering from hair loss. AFS holds two registered patents related to hair loss imaging and has three patents pending for AFS 3D.

name: inReach® Messenger Plus
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Say it, show it, share it with the inReach Messenger Plus SOS satellite communicator and the Garmin Messenger companion app for smartphones. When you’re beyond cell service, connect your compatible smartphone to inReach Messenger Plus to tell friends and family you miss them — or show them the view with voice recordings, photos and group messaging on the Garmin Messenger app. Built for extreme adventures, the inReach Messenger Plus has a battery that can lasts for weeks plus safety charging to help restore a deplated phone. Explore with peace of mind knowing you can trigger an interactive SOS message anytime.

name: Intelligent Illuminated Door Panel
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: TactoTek's Intelligent Illuminated Door Panel uses patented Surface Light™ technology for edge-to-edge dynamic lighting that maximizes uniformity and minimizes the number of LEDs in ultra-thin packaging. Surface Light outperforms traditional PCBA electronics and OLEDs, and is suitable for both interior and exterior applications. Surface light structures are single piece, seamless parts as thin as 7mm as compared to 25+mm required for conventional electronics. Marketed B2B to OEMs and Tier suppliers, our unique technology licensing business model fosters a collaborative ecosystem, advancing high-performance, user-centric designs with IMSE® (Injection Molded Structural Electronics) technology.

name: Interior Cabin Sensing (ICS) 21 Radar
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: Magna's ICS 21 is a cutting-edge radar system designed for the interior cabin space. Its primary purpose is to detect occupants within a vehicle, with a particular focus on identifying if a child has been left behind. Once detected, this advanced radar technology promptly alerts the driver or bystander to take immediate action. By providing this crucial functionality, ICS 21 plays a vital role in preventing tragic incidents and safeguarding the well-being of vulnerable passengers from heatstroke or related injuries.

name: Ion heating system using ion & electronic to reduce carbon
honor: 2025 Honoree in Industrial Equipment and Machinery

name: iSteady V3 AI Tracking Smartphone Gimbal
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories
description: The iSteady V3 is a foldable, intelligent 3-axis smartphone gimbal with a magnetic AI tracker, fill light, remote control, and extension rod.

name: iVOLVE Robot, Total AI Tennis Play Partner system
description: iVOLVE System is a AI-driving tennis partner robot system that integrates information and communication technologies such as A.I. and computer vision to move and compete as a real tennis player. It consists of iVOLVE Pro(AI-driving tennisball machine), iVOLVE Eyes(AI vision system), iVOLVE Collecter(ball organizing robot). The iVOLVE Pro can shoot the ball while moving like a human according to iVOLVE Eyes. iVOLVE Collecter can organize tennis balls on the floor even through iVOLVE Eyes. iVOLVE System provides a systematic and realistic training experience to its users, so they may not need another player to play with.

name: January AI
description: January's new app, launched in 2024, is the first and only product to use generative AI to predict a person's blood sugar without requiring a sensor, allowing people to see the impact a food would have on their body without ever having to take a bite — helping combat the rise in chronic diseases like prediabetes, diabetes, and obesity.

name: JBL TOUR PRO 3 Experience
description: The JBL TOUR PRO 3 is the latest TWS headphones product featuring the upgraded Smart Charging Case™. This innovative case not only allows users to quickly check headphone status and change settings without the need for a mobile phone or app, but it also doubles as a wireless transmitter, compatible with all USB and 3.5mm Aux audio sources.

name: JU, Just Universe
description: JU, Just Universe is an innovative AI education solution that empowers students to independently conduct professional-level scientific experiments in a safe environment. This platform automates remote experiments, integrating with Flow Science Labs and Flow Lab robots, allowing students to control real scientific experiment Flow Science Labs. Through JU, Just Universe, students consult AI from hypothesis to data analysis and can monitor and control Flow Science Labs either directly in front of them or in labs located in other countries. This innovation ensures safe and easy scientific exploration from anywhere in the world, redefining the future of science education.

name: Kara Pod
description: Kara Pod is the world’s first self-refilling coffee machine! Using Kara Water’s breakthrough Air-To-Water technology, Kara Pod is a dual-purpose countertop drinking water dispenser that doubles as a coffee machine. The innovative device gives users the freedom to cut the cord on tap and bottled water by transforming pure air into 13 cups of clean drinking water or freshly brewed coffee every 24 hours. Kara Pod also uses fully compostable environmental coffee pods made of plant-based fibers. Kara Pod is the lowest priced Air-To-Water dispenser available in the market, making transformational Air-To-Water technology accessible to all.

name: Kardian Bibi
description: Kardian Bibi is a patented, contactless health monitoring device designed specifically for babies and young children. It continuously tracks respiratory and heart rates without the need for wearables, audio, or video, ensuring a non-intrusive, accurate, and reliable way to monitor your child’s well-being. With a simple plug-and-play setup, a sleek design, and future firmware updates that allow it to evolve as your child grows, Kardian Bibi offers parents peace of mind, knowing their child is always under watchful care.

name: KATR
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Industrial Equipment and Machinery
description: The KATR is a four-wheeled robot designed to provide a stable platform on uneven terrain. It features a unique stability control system that adjusts the robot's four legs to maintain a level cargo deck, even on hills and slopes. Powered by either combustion engine or electric drive, the robot has a load capacity of 240 kg and can be controlled either remotely or via an onboard controller. The KATR is compact, yet robust enough for off-road applications in agriculture and construction. It is the first of its kind to be practically applied in such demanding environments.

name: Keychron K2 HE Wireless Magnetic Custom Keyboard
description: The Keychron K2 HE redefines mechanical keyboards with magnetic switches, offering customizable actuation points from 0.2-3.8mm with 0.1mm precision. It can program and customize the key's trigger distance and triggered value, allowing users to program each key's function and assign varied actions to a single key depending on how deeply it is pressed. It gives users unlimited possibilities. This 75% layout keyboard supports wired and wireless (2.4GHz, Bluetooth) connectivity. It features a premium design with natural wood finishes and RGB backlightings. The K2 HE has a web-based configurator, which makes it compatible with Windows, macOS, Android, and even Linux.

name: KINDOC Endo - The generative AI solution for endoscopy
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, Human Security for All

name: L'Oréal SYNC™
description: L'Oréal SYNC™ is a revolutionary assistive beauty system designed to empower individuals with upper limb challenges or mobility issues. This first-of-its-kind system solves the challenges associated with traditional makeup application, like opening and closing compacts, twisting lipsticks, and removing caps, with a touchless process that makes applying makeup effortless and enjoyable.

name: LADIS
description: A cap-type UV drinking water sterilizer that fits like a cap on a plastic bottle to sterilize the drinking water in the bottle. A lamp inside the product shines UV-C wavelengths that can destroy 99.9% of bacteria, viruses, and other microorganisms in less than two minutes, providing safe drinking water that can help prevent waterborne illnesses.

name: LCD Sun-Burn Free Conventional AR HUD
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: AR-HUD should have a wide FoV to show AR information. However, for AR-HUD with a wide FoV range, it is difficult to use LCD-based PGUs, because a lot of solar energy is concentrated on the PGU and cause damage. Therefore, most AR-HUDs are based on DLP/LCoS projection PGUs, which are expensive and show the same or lower image quality. This problem is a big problem for expanding the AR-HUD market. MOBIS has developed a sun-burn issue for LCD-based PGUs, which has price competitiveness and good image quality, so we believe that it will greatly contribute to expanding the AR market.

name: learnCoach
description: Our AI tutor, learnCoach, gives you a learning space you can use whenever, wherever. It's an AI you can talk to, built with our own unique technology. Rather than just giving answers, it guides you through problem-solving one step at a time. A clever system monitors how you learn and perform, then creates lessons tailored just for you. Advanced speech recognition helps overcome language barriers, enabling easy learning without writing complex math equations. Powered by state-of-the-art AI, learnCoach is set to be adopted by digital textbook companies, with over 1 million K-12 students expected to start using it in 2025.

name: Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid
description: The ThinkBook Plus Hybrid is an innovative detachable dual-system solution designed for productivity. The perfect “Hybrid” laptop and tablet user experiences and two different ecosystems. The detachable screen and keyboard station can be used together as a laptop or separately as a tablet or PC alone, providing multiple modes of use.

name: Lenovo ThinkCentre Neo Ultra
description: ThinkCentre neo Ultra is the first hardware enabled commercial AI desktop that is powered by a Hybrid XPU (CPU + GPU and a discrete NPU). Accelerate the process of content generation in a compact 3.6L small size desktop.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 13 Aura Edition
description: The most personal X1 Carbon ever created, supporting the latest AI enabled features from Microsoft Copilot+PC, as well as Lenovo exclusive Aura Edition experiences that will transform the PC to user interface like never before. And not to mention, the thinnest, lightest(sub 1kg) and most powerful X1 Carbon ever designed.

name: LERTS2.0(AIoT-based Safety and Health Monitoring System)
description: HHS developed an intelligent IoT system that combines bio-signal processing technology and complex sensing technology in order to analyze and monitor workers' individual risk status and health in real time for the four most common accident types (fall, bump, suffocation, and heat-related illness) that occur in ultra-high-risk workplaces. This system provides a data-based integrated worker safety management service that determines risks through analysis of workers' individual movement patterns and EEG analysis technology and combines harmful gas detection technology using IoT sensor arrays.

name: LESA-pass
description: Lesa-pass is a new concept of AI-based cybersecurity solution, using 'lip-sync secret words (1 factor)' as well as 'facial recognition (2 factor)' for authentication. ‘Lesa’ stands for ‘Lips and facial Expression Synchronous Authentication’.

name: Lexar Professional DIAMOND CFexpress™ 4.0 Type B Card
Lexar SL500 Portable SSD with Magnetic Set
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: 1. Attach and Go Portable SSD with a magnetic sleeve to easily attach to phone and laptops. Includes a magnetized, protective sleeve, an additional magnetic ring to use with a laptop cover or other device, and a wrist strap. This convenient magnetic set lets you easily and neatly attach the drive to your device. Also has exceptional USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Performance with blazing-fast speeds of up to 2000MB/s read and 1800MB/s write accelerate data transfers for more efficient work. Supports Apple ProRes recording.

name: LG 77-inch 4K OLED Zero Connect Wallpaper TV
description: The 4K 77-inch W5 is the culmination of many years of LG technical knowhow. Less than ½” thick, it blends into your wall without visible AV wires. This is achieved without compromise, as the TV offers LG’s best OLED picture quality, featuring a brighter more colorful OLED display capable of gaming (up to 144Hz with VRR). It includes LG’s most advanced α11 AI Processor inside a Zero Connect Box that wireless sends your AV connections to the TV, eliminating clutter and freeing TV placement. The W5 is the perfect TV, offering the best of what is possible in a TV.

name: LG 83-inch 4K OLED Audio & Wireless TV
description: LG’s 83-inch M5 TV provides for seamless transmission of high-quality audio and 4K 144Hz video, allowing users to customize their space with no need to worry about wires or clutter. The M5 serves as LG’s pinnacle 4K OLED benefiting from LG’s longstanding OLED market leadership. Featuring LG’s Most Advanced OLED AI Processor, which was designed specifically for OLED, the M5 offers new enhanced picture processing and features that takes its OLED picture and consumer usability to the next level.

name: LG 83-inch OLED 4K TV
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Video Displays
description: The LG83G5 premium OLED offers unrivaled brightness thanks to enhanced Brightness Booster Max technology, with clarity and realism that transports you into the scene. Its α11 AI Processor uses deep learning technology four times faster than the existing α9, precisely detecting, analyzing, and optimizing content, delivering more detailed, and lifelike images with space-filling realistic sound quality with AI Sound Pro technology and Virtual 11.1.2 channel sound. For large screen gamers, the VRR has been increased to 165 Hz delivering an overwhelming gaming experience In addition, the webOS25 Re:New Program supports multiple Operating System upgrades ensuring the latest User Experience.

name: LG 88-inch OLED 8K TV (Model OLED88Z3)
description: The 88-inch LG SIGNATURE OLED 8K TV (88Z3) has been improved for digital artists in 2025. It displays amazing 8K image is powered by over 132 million individually controlled subpixel dimming zones, allowing for amazing detail, contrast, and colors. In 2025 artists will gain the ability to connect their Z3 over the internet to their Apple Computers and PCs allowing them to connect remotely to their workspaces and edit, color correct, and improve their artwork, even on site. Additionally this TV now is supported by LG’s Re:New program that allows the TV multiple years of usability upgrades and security.

name: LG CineBeam (Model PF600U)
description: The PF600U is a multi-purpose device designed to create a personalized ambiance with videos, music and lights that cater to individual preferences. It offers unparalleled convenience with a stand-pole design for effortless installation. As a 3-in-1 multi-purpose device, the PF600U provides the ultimate versatility, integrating a projector, a Bluetooth speaker, and an LED lighting mood lamp.

name: LG gram Pro 2-in-1 (Model 16T90TP)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Hardware & Components
description: The LG gram Pro 2-in-1 (16T90TP) laptop combines outstanding portability, a hallmark of the LG gram series, with high-performance capabilities powered by the latest Intel AI CPU, Arrow Lake Ultra, which adds a distinctive AI experience through its integrated sLLM. The device also boasts a 120Hz DCI-P3 100% OLED touch display with anti-reflective coating, ensuring a studio-quality environment anywhere, and dual fan cooling system. The On-Device AI provides continuous support to the user, while the seamless design of the touch pen and 360-degree rotatable form factor delivers exceptional productivity.

name: LG MyView Touch&Move (Model 32U889SA)
description: LG MyView Smart Monitor gives users access to various entertainment and productivity apps via webOS without a PC. It can also be controlled via touch and voice commands to boost user convenience, and includes an Ergo moving stand, supports Chromecast wireless connectivity and features AI capabilities for an incredible level of optimization based on the user’s preferences and environment.

name: LG Pet Care Zone
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Pet Tech & Animal Welfare
description: LG Pet Care Zone was created for your pet’s healthy and happy life. A dual entry/exit temperature-controlled pet house provides a sense of security and relaxation, while sophisticated, modern sensors and AI algorithms monitor your pet’s vital signs, such as heart and respiratory rates, weight, and temperature, all in comfort without restraint. Featuring a built-in camera and mobile app, you can remotely monitor your pet while tracking and running AI health checks on conditions, such as patella luxation, gum disease and obesity, as well as conduct remote vet consultations, delivering the ultimate peace of mind at an unprecedented level.

name: LG System Iron
description: Delivering an outstanding performance, LG’s advanced yet elegantly simple System Iron redefines the ironing experience.

name: LG ThinQ ON
description: ThinQ ON is an AI voice assistant that acts as the central hub in a smart home. As an OS-type hub, it seamlessly connects various devices and services. With the integration of generative AI, it facilitates natural daily conversations and provides information by leveraging the control functions and data of home appliances and IoT products within the smart home. Its compact and sleek design allows it to blend in anywhere in the house without being obtrusive.

name: LG UltraFine™️ 6K Monitor (Model 32U990A)
description: LG’s latest UltraFine (model 32U990A) monitor is the world's first 6K high-resolution monitor to come with Thunderbolt™ 5 and its versatile connectivity. Featuring a Nano IPS Black panel, it delivers exceptional color accuracy and a high contrast with a wide color gamut covering 99.5% of Adobe RGB and 98% of DCI-P3. With calibration software support, this monitor is perfect for media professionals, while its slim, geometric design enhances both aesthetics and user convenience to satisfy every kind of user.

name: LG UltraGear™ OLED Bendable Gaming Monitor (Model 45GX990A)
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Gaming & eSports, Imaging
description: LG UltraGear™ OLED Bendable Gaming Monitor (Model 45GX990A) is the world’s first WUHD (5,120x2,160) OLED bendable gaming monitor. This monitor can transition from flat to a 900R curvature within seconds. Also featuring Dual-Mode functionality, 45GT99UE seamlessly switches between WUHD 165Hz and WFHD 330Hz to achieve the optimal gaming performance for different types of games.

name: Lingo
description: Abbott’s consumer biowearable, Lingo, is designed for consumers 18 years and older who are looking to improve their overall health and wellness. Lingo will track glucose and provide personalized insights and customized coaching to help people create healthy habits, retrain their metabolism and improve their overall well-being. The Lingo system combines a biosensor that is worn on the upper arm for 14 days and continuously streams glucose data to a coaching application on a smart phone – translating the body’s language and giving insights on the person’s reaction to food, exercise and life’s daily stressors.

name: LIVALL PikaBoost 2 E-bike Conversion Kit
description: LIVALL PikaBoost 2 is a creative and revolutionary e-bike conversion kit designed to convert traditional bicycles into e-bikes, providing cyclists with a power boost when needed. It features a compact, all-in-one design that integrates a motor, battery, control system, LED taillights, and a Fall Detection & SOS alert system, enhancing visibility and safety for riders.

name: LLM-driven digital friends and communities for you
description: TATA is a hardware-software integrated solution, featuring a holographic digital human display cabinet combined with advanced AI language models. It adapts to various environments, such as campuses, offering real-time interaction, brief Q&A, and access to external websites or proprietary knowledge bases. Deployed via LMDeploy, it supports multiple platforms with a user-friendly Vue.js interface. The holographic display enhances engagement, making TATA a versatile solution for education and marketing, with capabilities like image processing, multi-agent task management, and continuous online presence as a digital companion.

name: LPDDR5X 10.7Gbps
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Samsung Electronics has developed the industry's first LPDDR5X DRAM, achieving speeds of up to 10.7 Gbps using 12 nanometer-class process technology. This development advances the performance of low-power DRAM and is the smallest chip size among existing LPDDRs. The technology is designed to support the increasing requirements of AI-driven applications from PCs, servers, and vehicles to emerging on-device AI applications, offering a balance of high performance and energy efficiency. LPDDR5X solidifies Samsung's position in the low-power DRAM memory market.

name: LUCI
description: LUCI is a privacy-first, temporal computing platform designed to bring lifelong memory and context-aware intelligence to your fingertips. At its core is a custom operating system, Life OS, which enables intuitive, on-demand recall of life events through a highly personalized AI assistant, Contextual Intelligence. This assistant operates with a comprehensive understanding of the user's life context, powered by our proprietary Memory-augmented video intelligence (Mavi).Components:1. The Pin: A wearable and interactable intelligence pin featuring a high-definition 12MP ultra-wide lens and dual microphones, capable of capturing over 4 hours of continuous video and audio. It includes a privacy switch, allowing users to quickly disable the camera and microphones, giving them complete control over personal data capture at any time.2. The Hub: This unit serves as the processing center, housing the AI's ""brain."" The Hub stores and processes data locally, sharing the user's memories only with their Contextual Intelligence assistant. With privacy as a top priority, no data is uploaded to the cloud without explicit user consent, keeping all computations and memory storage entirely local.

name: LuxCare Mini Washer-Dryer Combo
description: The LuxCare Mini Washer-Dryer Combo is a compact, all-in-one unit designed for delicate garments. Its sleek design integrates seamlessly with home decor, making it suitable for bedrooms or walk-in closets. The washer-dryer features advanced cleaning technology that ensures gentle care for intimates and specialty fabrics while achieving 99.99% bacterial removal. The autodosing system manages detergent for up to 15 cycles, streamlining the laundry process. With a rapid wash-and-dry cycle of just 78 minutes, LuxCare Mini offers efficiency and convenience. Intuitive settings are tailored for delicate items, balancing superior cleaning performance with effective sanitization.

name: Lyten Lithium-Sulfur Batteries
description: The Lyten Lithium-Sulfur battery is made with lithium, sulfur, and our patented 3D Graphene™. Made in cylindrical and pouch cell formats for use in electric vehicles in automotive, trucking, aerospace, space, and stationary applications.

name: M9 Smart Monitor
description: The Samsung M9 Smart Monitor presents industry-first AI and OLED technology. It evolves monitors from a passive screen to an interactive display through 4K OLED image quality, Generative AI Voice Assistant, and AI Search powered by Microsoft Copilot. With the introduction of Copilot and Copilot shortcut buttons, it is the first AI monitor to provide multiple AI features as a standalone monitor and when connected to a PC but. It is a slim flat-back monitor, thanks to its real metal material and proprietary Samsung heat pipe solution.

name: Maderr AI
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps

name: MagFusion GameFrost Magnetic Wireless Charger with Active Cooling
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: MagFusion GameFrost is a premium wireless charger featuring AUKEY's latest active cooling technology. Qi2-certified, it delivers 15W fast wireless charging for iPhone 12 and later models, while the Omnia-Frez active cooling system reduces charging temperature by up to 20°C (68°F), preventing overheating and ensuring a cooler, more efficient, and safer charging experience that also protects battery health. Users can manually control both charging and cooling functions, using it as a cooler, a charger, or both. The real-time temperature display allows users to monitor temperature changes instantly with a quick glance, while customizable lighting effects enhance the gaming atmosphere. It’s the perfect solution for mobile gamers seeking the ultimate gaming and charging experience.

name: Magnetomyography (MMG) Magnetic Sensor
description: Neuranics has developed highly sensitive magnetic sensors utilising cutting-edge Tunnel Magnetoresistance (TMR) quantum technology to detect minute muscle magnetic activity. This technology aims to revolutionise next-generation wearables with a unique Human Machine Interface (HMI) and precise gesture recognition. The patent-pending Magnetomyography (MMG) Magnetic Sensor operates with a single body contact or through thin clothing, potentially replacing existing electromyography (EMG) sensors in fitness and gesture recognition in the Metaverse as they provide better spatial resolution and are more comfortable to wear. Visit Neuranics at Venetian Expo, Hall G - 62046 for a live demonstration.

name: MATRx: Privacy-first AI Fall Detection Mat
company: AI and Robotics Ventures Company Limited
description: MATRx is an AI-powered fall detection mat that intelligently recognizes falling accidents and instantly calls or texts emergency contacts for immediate lifesaving intervention. Powered by an AI-Enabled Ultra-High Precision Pressure Sensing Matrix, MATRx achieves this without the need for external wearables or cameras, thus preserving your utmost privacy in the most intimate settings. At MATRx, we believe AI can make a meaningful impact and save lives while remaining accessible and affordable to communities worldwide.

name: Matter-Compliant Wirelessly-Powered Smart Home Automation Sensors
MCE’s Styrofoam Upcycling and Sustainable Agriculture
description: MCE provides a container module that processes styrofoam into feed blocks, enabling mealworms to break it down effectively. This module is easily installed and expanded, making it an efficient solution for styrofoam waste. MCE's process reduces carbon emissions by 93% compared to recycling and over 99% compared to incineration, minimizing environmental impact. The UNEP warns that styrofoam's social costs could reach $25 billion by 2025, highlighting the need for such solutions. MCE's feed blocks allow mealworms to consume up to 92% of styrofoam and convert it into organic fertilizer in just one day, supporting sustainable agriculture and global food security.

name: MEG Vision X AI
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, Gaming & eSports
description: The MEG VISION X AI, MSI's flagship AI gaming desktop, features an innovative 13-inch "AI HMI" touch panel display integrated with AI, including Microsoft Copilot for voice commands and offline capabilities like MSI AI Artist. The AI HMI also offers real-time hardware monitoring, app recognition, on-the-fly adjustments to the PC's user interface, and AI-driven temperature controls that dynamically adjust fans for optimal performance and acoustics. The display can even serve as a secondary screen, providing extra utility. Equipped with the latest Intel CPUs, built-in NPUs, and top-end NVIDIA graphics, the Vision redefines what is possible with a PC.

name: MEG Z890 UNIFY-X
description: X for extreme, the MEG Z890 UNIFY-X motherboard is designed for extreme memory overclockers. It features two DIMM slots for cleaner DDR5 memory signals that push the boundaries of memory overclocking.

name: Metafarmer with Tapfarmers
description: MetaFarmers creates AI-powered robotic solutions designed to transform agriculture. Their suite includes MetaFarmer robots, which specialize in precise crop harvesting, and TapFarmers software, enabling remote management of farming operations. Together, these technologies utilize advanced robotics, adaptive AI, and specialized end-effector tools to significantly enhance farming productivity and efficiency, making agricultural practices smarter and more streamlined.

name: Metis Compute Board
description: It is a cutting-edge embedded platform that combines the power of a high end embedded ARM SoC with Axelera’s Metis AI accelerator. Designed for power efficient and high-performance applications, it provides a one-stop solution to run multiple end-to-end AI applications on tens of video streams. This includes parallel computer vision and natural language processing tasks.

name: MEW air purifier
description: The MEW Air Purifier uses innovative electrohydrodynamic technology to clean air using only water and electricity. It generates charged micro-droplets containing hydroxyl radicals that eliminate germs, viruses, and fine dust without producing harmful byproducts. Compact and portable, it fits easily into vehicle cup holders, making it ideal for personal use in various environments. Its unique design eliminates the need for filters, offering a maintenance-free and eco-friendly solution for air purification.

name: MICRO LED BEAUTY MIRROR
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Beauty & Personal Care

name: Mij(tm)
description: Mij™ (pronounced ‘me’) is the first and only wearable clothing designed to optimize your body's thermal environment without compromising personal style. Effective regulation of body temperature is linked to a multitude of benefits, including reduced stress hormone response, increased muscle performance, reduction of injury, and increased mental focus. Built upon a brand-new era of sensor-based textiles, Mij™ discreetly measures the temperature and humidity within your everyday clothing - calculating your "personal thermal index". This actionable data empowers you to make better informed decisions about daily habits, clothing choices, etc. to maximize users’ personal health.

name: minVerse
description: The minVerse is a compact haptic device designed to elevate metaverse interactions. Offering unparalleled precision for 3D touch, it delivers realistic tactile feedback, enabling users to interact with virtual environments with exceptional accuracy. Its small form factor makes it highly portable, perfect for immersive experiences anywhere. Additionally, the minVerse features a quick-change handle, known as a VerseGrip, that allows users to swap accessories, customizing the device for specific tasks. Within the metaverse, the minVerse is not just a tool — it’s a game-changer that sets the standard for immersive, tactile interaction in the metaverse.

name: Mirror Objet
description: LG’s smart mirror, "Mirror Objet" is a superior interior object that enhances your own spaces with its beautiful and elegant design and touch display featuring various art poster graphics and live screens. It allows for easy control of home appliances via both voice controller and seamless UX with a display, and provides convenient access to time, weather, schedule information, and many third-party services in real life, enriching experiences in the living room, bedroom, entrance hall, and other areas.

name: Mixed Reality Makeup - 0 min try-on studio
ML-U
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility

name: MNVision
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps, XR Technologies & Accessories

name: Moasure 2 PRO
honor: 2025 Honoree in Industrial Equipment and Machinery
description: Pocket-sized Moasure 2 PRO, second generation of the world’s first-and-only motion-based measuring device, is our most advanced, accurate tool yet.

name: Mobile Ankle-foot Exoneuromusculoskeleton
description: The mobile ankle-foot exoneuromusculoskeleton (ENMS) is the first-of-its-kind that integrates multi-modal advantages of exoskeletons, soft pneumatic muscles, neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES), and vibrotactile sensory feedback into a single, lightweight wearable system powered by a 9V rechargeable battery. This unique combination not only allows for effective correction of post-stroke footdrop and foot inversion, which are common issues faced by stroke patients, but also makes the whole system easy to use by non-professionals in self-help telerehabilitation.

name: MobiRobo
description: Introducing the MobiRobo – the most innovative, ultralight, dexterous robotic arm designed for ultimate precision on the move. In stark contrast to conventional robotic arms, which are heavy, bulky, and confined to one place, the MobiRobo redefines mobility and versatility. Equipped with our patented stabilization technology, it ensures unparalleled stability and accuracy, even in motion. Whether mounted on drones, UGVs, or humanoids, elevate your mobile platform capabilities and embrace the future of robotics with MobiRobo.

name: Mogabi Education Guitar
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Mogabi guitar is the world's first instrument developed as a portable studio. You can take it anywhere and play it, recording sound that is even clearer than what you would get in a studio. To optimize portability, it is designed to fold in half. The audio box, developed for the sound box, integrates recording, playback, and a speaker, allowing you to immediately record, listen to, and practice your performance, quickly improving your skills. This makes it the easiest and fastest product to approach the music. This efficient learning feature can reconnect even developing countries, including Africa, through music

name: MOGLU: Noninvasive Continuous Glucose Monitoring Device
description: MOGLU is a noninvasive continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) device designed to revolutionize diabetes care. Using innovative Raman spectroscopy technology, it detects glucose-reactive signals on the skin, reducing costs and enhancing convenience. We are the only team worldwide to directly observe in vivo Raman signals for glucose. Since 2023, we've collaborated with Professor Peter So's team at MIT's Biological Engineering department on clinical trials. We plan to conduct larger trials at the Joslin Diabetes Center later this year and aim for FDA approval in 2025. Our data so far indicates that MOGLU could potentially become the first FDA-approved noninvasive CGM.

name: molluSCAN 2.0
description: molluSCAN provides a bio-monitoring system that harnesses the natural sensitivity of bivalve mollusks to assess water quality continuously. This technology combines electronics, mathematics, and biology to provide 24/7 monitoring of aquatic environments. By equipping oysters, mussels, or other bivalves with non-invasive sensors, the system tracks their behavior, including valve movements and stress responses, as indicators of water pollution. The mollusks act as living sentinels, offering early warning detection of contaminants and environmental changes. This solution enables industries, municipalities and environmental agencies to monitor water quality in real-time, enhancing their ability to protect aquatic ecosystems and respond swiftly to pollution events.

name: Monoxer Junior
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Introducing Monoxer Junior: the first-of-its-kind home learning app for preschool and elementary school education, focusing on durable knowledge retention. Our pioneering AI delivers a seamless learning experience for children, by tailoring quiz difficulty in real-time, based on memorization level, ensuring knowledge buildup that truly sticks. Leveraging its multi-patented quiz-generating technology, Monoxer Junior is a versatile solution that can address a variety of educational domains with no equivalent in the industry. Monoxer Junior makes fundamental literacy and numeracy acquisition possible for all children.

name: Mood Mirror™
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, XR Technologies & Accessories

name: Moonlock Engine in CleanMyMac by MacPaw
description: CleanMyMac is a smart and effortless Mac care app that has been around for 16 years and serves over 30 million users worldwide. The app gives Mac users full control of their devices: it cleans up junk, declutters Mac storage, removes malware threats, and manages apps. The Malware Removal module at CleanMyMac is powered by Moonlock Engine, which has made malware scanning in CleanMyMac much faster and more efficient. It allows users to “search” for malware in additional locations not covered before, as well as the possibility to configure scans according to users’ needs.

name: Motion Wi-Fi Sensing Plug
description: Threshold’s Motion Wi-Fi Sensing Plug (Motion) is the first-of-its-kind, non-invasive Wi-Fi sensing smart plug designed to provide real-time motion insights to caregivers and family members without using cameras or wearables. Motion is a simple and easy-to-use solution that provides family caregivers insights into motion patterns for an overall understanding of the well-being of their loved ones, all without requiring any behavior changes from those being provided care.

name: MouthPad^
description: At Augmental, we redesigned the computer mouse from the ground up to make it more universally accessible. The MouthPad^ is an intraoral interface that enables hands-free control of digital devices — including computers, tablets and smartphones — using tongue and head gestures. It offers seamless Bluetooth connectivity and is compatible with all common operating systems as a wireless mouse. Custom-fitted for comfort and made with dental-grade materials, the MouthPad^ is designed to enhance accessibility for users with disabilities and provide intuitive, mouth-based interaction for all.

name: MPG 272URX QD-OLED
description: The MPG 272URX QD-OLED monitor features advanced OLED panel technology with Quantum Dot technology, delivering superior contrast, comfort, and a lightning-fast 0.03 ms GtG response time. MSI leads the industry by introducing this technology with DP 2.1 and exclusive AI features.

name: MPG Z890I EDGE TI WIFI
description: The MPG Z890I EDGE TI WIFI is a white color, compact ITX motherboard capable of delivering powerful performance and expandability.

name: Mudra Link
description: Mudra Link is a neural input wristband that controls digital devices using gestures. Its Surface Nerve Conductance sensors capture electrical impulses from motor neurons, translated by AI algorithms into commands, facilitating a seamless interface for interacting with technology.

name: Multi-Mic+
description: The Multi-Mic+ is a wireless remote microphone designed to enhance hearing experiences in challenging listening environments. As well as supporting Telecoil, FM systems, and DAI/direct audio input, it’s the world’s first remote microphone with Bluetooth® Low Energy (LE) Audio and AuracastTM broadcast audio technology, revolutionizing wireless connectivity. Unlike traditional remote microphones which are limited to specific hearing aid brands, the Multi-Mic+ can broadcast audio to multiple users simultaneously, regardless of their device type. This includes hearing aids, cochlear implants, earbuds or any other Auracast enabled device, making it the most inclusive solution for diverse needs.

name: My Aura™
description: My Aura is a new, first-of-its-kind assistive beauty device that sprays perfume without pushing a button. This fragrance holder reimagines perfume application for everyone. Designed with accessibility at its core, My Aura empowers individuals with upper limb or visual disabilities to enjoy their favorite scents with ease. Simply hover your hand, wrist, or any preferred body part near the sensor to release a delicate spray. Any brand of perfume can be used in this device, unlike Aura, which is made for Lancôme fragrances.

name: Myant - Osmotex : Active Electroosmotic Membrane Jackets
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Fashion Tech

name: Nano-Stream
honor: 2025 Honoree in Industrial Equipment and Machinery
description: Nano-Stream is the industry’s most efficient automated storage and retrieval system (AS/RS), designed for unparalleled flexibility and scalability. Unlike conventional systems that are designed for at least 10,000 square feet, Nano-Stream can be effectively installed in spaces as small as 1,000 square feet, achieving high storage density and transport capacity. It utilizes demountable cranes and AGVs for product retrieval, allowing for easy initial installation with potential for scaling. This significant reduction in labor costs and space requirements positions our solution uniquely in the untapped niche of warehouse automation.

name: Nanobubble Generator
description: Fawoo Nanotech's Nanobubble Generator is a powerful tool for capturing and using carbon dioxide (CO2). It creates tiny bubbles called nanobubbles that help dissolve large amounts of CO2 into liquids. This speeds up chemical reactions, making it possible to turn captured CO2 into useful products like stronger concrete and valuable industrial materials. This technology helps reduce carbon emissions and create a more sustainable future.

name: NanoLoom
description: NanoLoom: Redefining Drug Discovery with DNA Curtains Technology

name: NAQI Neural Earbud
description: Naqi Neural Earbuds transform technology interaction, allowing users to control computers, devices, IoT, AI, and wheelchairs without voice, touch, or screens. Naqi is ideal for anyone who relies on assistive technologies such as quadriplegics, disabled veterans, amputees, and also for those who want to have a “third hand” to do more by creating a safe, non-invasive alternative to brain implants. When computer and mobile screens aren't available, Naqi's Invisible User Interface provides intuitive control over your connected world. Naqi is not only redefining accessibility, but we're also creating a superpower for everyone by redefining how humanity interacts with technology.

name: Neuro Wellness Enhancer
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All
description: Neuro Wellness Enhancer is the world's first medically-approved home-use device designed to improve depressive symptoms. Using non-invasive micro direct current stimulation, it balances brain activity, enhancing brain function with a 62.8% remission rate over six weeks. Controlled via a mobile app, it allows users to manage their treatment from home, tracking usage and integrating data for potential future medical consultations. Its intuitive design ensures ease of use, offering a convenient alternative to traditional antidepressants with minimal side effects.

name: NeuroFluidics Care for crops chemical human toxicology
description: NeuroFluidics care is a remotely accessible service that enables early analysis of the toxicity of biochemical compounds used by food productor. Industrials send their targeted biochemicals to our laboratories, along with an online questionnaire on the mode of action of the compound and how it is supposed to affect crop growth, preservation or processing. After one week, the app will provide predictive data on potential toxicology effects that could impact human health with the risk of developing associated diseases.

name: Neuroid Next
description: Neuroid Next is the world’s first metaverse platform specifically designed for generating 3D motion for humans and animals. Leveraging the world’s largest 3D motion dataset, Neuroid Next is a generative AI-based 3D metaverse content creation platform that revolutionizes the traditionally time-consuming and costly 3D content creation process. Users can quickly and easily create high-quality, realistic 3D characters, environments, and motion content using text or voice commands. Additionally, Neuroid Next offers a next-generation immersive experience where users interact within 3D environments rather than passively consuming content. This platform democratizes 3D content creation, expanding humanity’s digital frontier and unlocking new possibilities.

name: Nexlide A+ Vehicle Lamp Module
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: Nexlide-A+ is an automotive front lamp lighting system featuring multiple light source packages mounted on a slim circuit board. Through advanced material and optical technology, it achieves world-class brightness and uniform illumination. Utilizing optical resin and film technologies, it can be designed in various styles such as slim line or surface lighting. It is suitable for various automotive exterior lighting applications, including DRL (Daytime Running Lights), position lights, turn signals, decorative lights, and logos.

name: Next Meat powered by Foodructure and Rheomer
company: SuFAB X Ewha (Interdisciplinary Structural Engineering Lab.& Food Nano Technology Lab.)

name: Nikon Z6III
description: The Nikon Z6III features the world’s first partially-stacked CMOS sensor to deliver ultra-fast readout speeds and high frame rates, making it the most versatile, capable and powerful mid-range mirrorless camera designed to give photographers and videographers unmatched performance. The 24.5MP full-frame mirrorless camera also features an EXPEED 7 image processing engine, an extremely fast autofocus system with advanced subject-detection technology and high-quality video capabilities, including internal 6K RAW capture. With the brightest EVF of any mirrorless camera, incredible low-light capabilities and a durable build quality, the Z6III offers reliability for any type of creator.

name: NODE ICON
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories
description: The NODE ICON is the flagship wireless music streamer for the most discerning audio enthusiasts. Every detail of the design has been performance engineered to set a new benchmark in the category, from its breakthrough Dual-Mono DAC design implemented to perfection with two ESS SABRE DACs, to its sleek aluminum chassis and stunning 5” full-color display. The NODE ICON also features all digital/analog inputs and outputs including HDMI eARC and balanced XLR outputs for high-quality connectivity and connects to BluOS-powered products.

name: Novel Flash LiDAR  with SiPM Sensor and Diffraction Optics
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility
description: The Flash LiDAR is a technology designed to enhance the capabilities of high-level autonomous driving. This system operates on the Flash Mode of Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) using the Time-of-Flight (ToF) method. The Flash Mode is enabled by Diffraction Optics, which distributes the laser beam across the field of view with a flexible scanning rate up to the kHz range. The integration of a CMOS-based microSiPM Optical Sensor ensures high sensitivity and provides 3D camera imagery, including ranging information, with intelligent on-chip processing. The system's compact design and modular structure make it versatile for various automotive applications.

name: Nuance Audio OTC Hearing Aid Glasses
description: Nuance Audio OTC Hearing Aid Glasses combine revolutionary technology with premium eyewear design to transform people's quality of life and ability to hear sounds for perceived mild to moderate hearing loss combined with vision needs in one unique product at the intersection of sight and hearing. The Nuance Audio glasses use beam forming technology to tune into your conversations with clarity while cutting through the background noise.

name: Nuki The Smart Lock
description: From the European leader in smart residential access solutions, Nuki’s 5th product generation is the best overall smart lock on the market, combining superior hardware quality, integration capabilities and stylish design. Nuki’s Smart Lock turns your smartphone into a key, making it possible to open your front door in seconds with just one swipe or fully automatically. The Nuki Smart Lock speaks Matter, the universal language of the smart home, and can be integrated with other platforms including Apple Home, Amazon Alexa, Google Home and more – making home entry part of a seamless connected home experience.

name: NutriTrex - AI Nutrition Coaching for Kids
Odem - 4D LiDAR Sensor
description: Odem, Lidwave's first production-ready 4D LiDAR-on-a-chip sensor heralds a new era of perception for industrial automation and safety, smart cities and traffic management, autonomous vehicles, and Advanced driver-assistance systems. Featuring a unique coherent architecture and software-defined FOV, Odem is a robust, cost-effective long-range 4D LiDAR sensor designed to enhance safety for all.

name: On-Demand Automotive Infotainment Center
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in In-Vehicle Entertainment
description: Corning and CarUX are thrilled to present the next generation of automotive display and design: Corning's Dynamic™ Décor enabled by Corning® ColdForm™ Technology. This breakthrough melds the perfect complement of form and function allowing OEMs to redefine the in-cabin experience. Dynamic Décor™, conceals the screen behind exquisite true-color images or patterns, seamlessly integrating into the automotive interior, while the Corning’s ColdForm™ Technology the display glass to be shaped at room temperature, for a more sustainable manufacturing process. These two innovations allow for auto makers to bring visionary curved displays and a more immersive infotainment experience to their customers.

name: On-Device biometric payment solution
description: GhostPass Inc. is a fully decentralized biometric authentication solution company that ensures users maintain sovereignty over their biometric information by securely storing it on their own smartphones. This technology is patented and is the first of its kind. Unlike conventional storage methods utilizing servers and/or the cloud, access to biometric information by third parties is structurally impossible and there are no concerns about monitoring and misusage. Furthermore, the risk of mass leakage of biometric information is fundamentally prevented.

name: OnePlus 13
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Presenting the all-new OnePlus 13, a technological marvel boasting an advanced camera system to capture moments that human eyes cannot perceive, robust Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile platform, and silky smooth OxygenOS 15 with OnePlus AI. With a mighty 6,000mAh battery and a stunning 2K quad-curved display with world's 1st DisplayMate A++ rating, it's built for endurance and elegance. Additionally, it's the pioneering smartphone to incorporate Microfiber vegan leather, setting a new standard for premium smartphone materials. With significant enhancements across photography, operating system, design, and performance, the OnePlus 13 ushers in a smarter, more reliable, and smoother mobile experience-truly redefining the game.

name: OpenMeet Professional Open-Ear Bone Conduction Headset
description: OpenMeet is the first professional communication headset to blend innovative bone conduction technology and over-the-head design. This open-ear headset delivers crystal-clear audio through cushioned transducers that rest comfortably on the cheekbones, allowing users to stay aware of their surroundings. Lightweight, portable, and fully adjustable, OpenMeet is engineered for all-day comfort and exceptional sound quality. Its high-precision microphone ensures clear communication in any environment. By merging premium bone conduction with a traditional design, OpenMeet offers a unique blend of comfort and functionality, making it the ideal choice for professionals who demand the best in audio technology.

name: OptimizeME
honor: 2025 Honoree in Smart Home, Digital Health
description: OptimizeME is the world's first smart mattress to combine automatic firmness adjustment for evenly distributed body pressure with real-time incline control to alleviate sleep apnea.OptimizeME utilizes three proprietary integrated bio-AI algorithms that analyze the users' sleep posture and pressure patterns to provide optimal firmness and cushioning. The algorithms also analyze irregular breathing patterns to adjust to the optimal inclination, leading to stable breathing.By pioneering the integration of AIoT technology with orthopedic and neurological therapeutic approaches, OptimizeME addresses sleep disorders and creates a life optimized for health through smart network connectivity and integration with other digital health providers.

name: Otiton Smart thermometer - Checking your Children
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: The Otiton smart thermometer is not just a thermometer it's a revolutionary tool equipped with endoscopes for easy at-home checks of otitis media. With the ability to improve early detection rates by over 90%, it empowers parents to catch signs of ear infections much earlier, reducing the risk of complications. The device syncs with a platform that helps users easily manage their medical history and medication. Portable and convenient, it ensures timely treatment and better health outcomes for children, whether at home or on the go. Currently patent-pending in Korea, the USA, and Japan.

name: OVIEW HABs Tester
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All
description: OVIEW HABs Tester is a portable lab device that pairs a microscope with AI-powered smartphone technology for swift, onsite analysis of harmful algal blooms (HABs). Users simply insert a water sample and use any smartphone camera to capture live video, which the device instantly analyzes to identify and quantify algae concentrations. The integrated app allows for real-time central monitoring, providing a rapid, accessible tool for tracking water quality and predicting pollution. OVIEW HABs Tester empowers timely environmental interventions, making it an indispensable solution for safeguarding water resources.

name: Ozlo Sleepbuds®

name: P7-S Software-Defined EV Chassis
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility

The first production model has been delivered to U-Haul as the delivery giant’s first and only EV solution. P7-S provides a completely customizable base that allows delivery companies to build the vehicle they need.

honor: 2025 Honoree in Pet Tech & Animal Welfare
description: Pawport is a patented, smart, secure pet door that retrofits onto existing pet doors in seconds, instantly converting old fashioned, flimsy, unsightly, and vulnerable pet doors into high-security doors that can be controlled via an app and integrated into a smart home. Pawport connects via WiFi to the Pawport app, enabling remote control and management, curfew and other scheduling functionality, voice control via Alexa, Siri, or Google, and pet-specific tracking and usage data. Pets utilize the door by virtue of a small, lightweight, waterproof Bluetooth collar tag that verifies the pet and opens Pawport when the pet is near.

name: Peri
description: Peri is a first-of-its-kind wearable device that accurately detects and tracks perimenopause symptoms, providing women with objective data, personalized actionable insights and encouragement to empower women to confidently navigate this new phase of their lives.

name: PETPA Multi-Pet Feeder
honor: 2025 Honoree in Pet Tech & Animal Welfare

name: Philips Wi-Fi Palm Recognition Smart Deadbolt
description: Philips Wi-Fi Palm Recognition Smart Deadbolt is the world's first residential smart deadbolt door lock featuring palm recognition technology. The lock offers touchless entry, recognizing unique palm vein patterns for quick, secure access. Integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth provide seamless remote control without the need for extra modules. The durable zinc alloy body and tempered glass touchscreen ensure both style and resilience. Certified with BHMA/ANSI Grade 2 security, this smart deadbolt is designed for modern homes, offering innovative security and convenience in one sleek package.

name: Phin Stim: Wireless Brain Monitor/Stimulation Implant
description: Phin Stim, developed by Gbrain, is a groundbreaking wireless neural implant redefining care for neurological conditions like Parkinson’s and epilepsy. Leveraging real-time brainwave monitoring and advanced therapeutic stimulation, Phin Stim delivers personalized treatment directly at the brain cortex without scalp-attached wires or invasive deep-brain penetration. Its innovative thin-film polymer electrode ensures superior flexibility and minimal tissue impact, offering precision, safety, and comfort. Designed for portability, Phin Stim enables on-the-go neuroplasticity therapy, empowering patients to maintain active lives while receiving continuous care.

name: Pickpad — Smart order pickup system powered by sensors and ML
description: Pickpad™ is a modular system of smart pads powered by sensors and machine learning, designed to help busy restaurants boost operational efficiency and customer retention.It seamlessly integrates into existing store designs and tech systems and, without changing any processes, double-checks order accuracy, updates all statuses, collects crucial data points, and delivers a unique, personalized customer experience.Pickpad™ eliminates manual, repetitive tasks, empowering restaurants to focus on what truly matters — exceptional hospitality!

name: Plantaform Smart Indoor Garden
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Food & AgTech
description: The Plantaform Smart Indoor Garden is an innovative, fully automated system designed to grow 15 fresh produce effortlessly at home, with a custom mobile app controlling factors such as temperature, humidity, light wavelengths, and watering cycles. The first indoor garden powered by NASA's fogponics technology, it offers a simple, efficient, and aesthetically beautiful way to cultivate a variety of plants year-round.

name: Playseat® Formula Instinct - F1® Edition

name: Polygom: Personalized 3D Avatar Creation Technology
description: Our advanced 3D human avatar services use advanced technology to create lifelike digital avatars from simple text and image prompts, capturing intricate facial expressions, body movements, and unique characteristics. Sophisticated algorithms ensure smooth, precise animations, enhancing realism and interactivity. Ideal for gaming, virtual reality, and online communication, this technology greatly improves digital human representation. We also provide customized software solutions tailored to corporate clients' specific needs, allowing them to generate highly detailed avatars efficiently. This service is perfect for industries seeking high-quality, realistic avatars that are both accessible and user-friendly.
