description: Prevenotics-G Pro is revolutionizing the prevention of gastric cancer through its groundbreaking AI platform. This system delivers real-time endoscopic diagnostics for conditions ranging from pre-cancerous to malignant, utilizing an advanced multi-modal AI surveillance system designed to optimize preventive care.With global survival rates for gastric cancer alarmingly low at 20-40%, our mission to achieve "cancer zero" is both urgent and critical. Through systematic preventive management, our platform facilitates early intervention at the pre-cancerous stage, where the potential impact is most substantial.Our innovative technology, protected by existing and pending patents, is currently undergoing clinical validation in leading medical institutions. Its continued advancement is driven by close collaboration with globally recognized experts in gastric cancer prevention.With Prevenotics-G Pro, we are not merely developing technology; we are aiming to transform survival outcomes in the management of gastric cancer.

name: PRiMX50U-Power
honor: 2025 Honoree in Industrial Equipment and Machinery
description: PRiMX50U-Power is the world's most powerful 21700-sized cylindrical 5.0Ah battery, driving the expansion of cordless products with advanced Tab-less technology. This innovative technology enhances alignment control, improves safety, and reduces resistance by 20% due to the thinner electrode plate that supports high power performance. The 5.0Ah capacity is achieved with 91% high-nickel cathode material and SCN(Si-Carbon-Nanocomposite) anode material. PRiMX50U-Power can charge to 80% capacity in just 15 minutes and provides more than three years of use without degradation. *PRiMX stands for "Prime Battery for Maximum Experience" which is SAMSUNG SDI's battery brand that encompasses all of our technologies and innovations.

name: PRiMX680 Module+
description: PRiMX680 Module+, our advanced EV battery module, integrates SAMSUNG SDI's 178Ah high-capacity prismatic NCM cells, delivering industry-leading energy efficiency and significantly extending driving ranges. It incorporates cutting-edge wireless CSC(Cell Sensor Circuit) technology, enhancing production efficiency and reliability by simplifying the module’s internal design. The module is versatile and suitable for a wide range of EV applications, from compact city cars to larger, more demanding vehicles, making it a pivotal component in the rapidly evolving automotive market. The integration of the thinner 131Ah cell variant further offers even greater flexibility for various vehicle configurations. *PRiMX is SAMSUNG SDI's battery brand.

name: PRiMX680-EV
description: PRiMX680-EV cell is SAMSUNG SDI's most up-to-date battery cell for electric vehicles with a capacity of 178Ah, standing as the world’s highest-capacity prismatic NCM cell. By utilizing cutting-edge high-nickel NCA materials and a sophisticated stacking process, it delivers an exceptional 680Wh/L energy density. This ensures significantly extended driving ranges, a crucial factor in meeting the growing demands of modern electric vehicle (EV) consumers. The cell’s robust prismatic design is engineered with top terminals and innovative directional venting, effectively managing gas flow in the unlikely event of a failure, thereby enhancing overall safety and reliability. *PRiMX is SAMSUNG SDI's battery brand.

name: ProArt P16
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Computer Hardware & Components
description: The ProArt P16 is a lightweight, high-performance laptop designed for creators and outdoor enthusiasts. Its 4K OLED touchscreen ensures photorealistic visuals, and versatile I/O ports seamlessly connect all your peripherals. It features an NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 40 Series GPU and AMD Ryzen™ AI 300 Series processor for exceptional processing power. The stealth hinge adds durability and improved cooling, while tri-fan cooling technology and an ASUS-exclusive thermal solution ensure silent performance. With the ASUS DialPad for intuitive control on creative apps, military-grade toughness, and a long-lasting battery, the ProArt P16 is the ultimate companion for creators on the go.

name: ProArt PZ13
description: Introducing the ProArt PZ13, an IP52-rated, military-grade detachable laptop for active outdoor creators. Its OLED touchscreen offers an incomparable viewing experience, powered by a Snapdragon® X Plus processor with 45 TOPS NPU for AI-enhanced creativity without sacrificing battery life. Versatile accessories include a detachable keyboard and the ASUS Pen 2.0. A full set of I/O ports, including an SD slot with a microSD adapter, simplifies connectivity and photo transfers. Its slim, lightweight build marries advanced tech with a superior user experience.

name: Project Dali
honor: 2025 Honoree in Computer Hardware & Components, Computer Peripherals & Accessories
description: This laptop features an e-ink display shell in the lid that maintains images without power, allowing users to easily customize the exterior of their machine with their favorite images or personal creations, even when the device is off. Users can seamlessly change the look of the machine in minutes to suit different tastes, occasions, or moods. Project Dali combines powerful gaming performance users expect from ROG with a unique platform for creative and personal expression, transforming the laptop into a personal billboard and a portable art piece.

name: ProPury
description: Our eco-friendly antibody purification device, ProPury revolutionizes biotechnology by enabling rapid, efficient antibody production from animal cells. Utilizing the innovative ENGI-R reagent, antibodies are enlarged and separated from the culture medium through a specialized capture filter, powered by our device's pump. Harvested with ENGI-EL reagent, the antibodies are ready for diverse research applications. By eliminating the need for Protein A resins and organic solvents, this technology is not only economical but also environmentally responsible. It significantly enhances researchers' productivity, reducing both time and costs in antibody production.

name: PUREMIRR-IAAK
description: PUREMIRR-IAAK (Implantable-Attachable Artificial Kidney) is a portable hemodialysis device designed to improve the quality of life for individuals with end-stage renal disease. By combining advanced membrane technology with a user-friendly system, PUREMIRR-IAAK allows patients to receive dialysis treatment outside of a hospital setting. This innovative solution offers greater freedom and flexibility, enabling patients to maintain a more normal lifestyle while managing their condition.

name: Putting View : On-device AI based Putting Training Device
PxE Holographic RGB-IR-Depth Camera

Through its hardware and software, PxE upgrades standard 2D cameras into a multi-functional system, while maintaining the size, cost structure, and image quality of standard cameras. Whether for security, automotive, robotics, or any other camera-based system, PxE’s innovation has the potential to replace all existing 2D cameras on the market – changing the foundation of digital cameras from 2D to 3D and beyond.

It supports dynamic standing exercises, crucial for early-stage training in severely disabled patients, and features a unique, power-free mechanism that facilitates real-time data and trend analysis. Compact and portable, it fits easily in therapy rooms, patient rooms, and lounges.

Featuring advanced AI-driven analytics and insights accessible through a live dashboard, it empowers operators to make data-informed decisions. Primarily suited for farms and gardens, Rocket 2.0 helps reduce water consumption while improving crop health and productivity.

It also boasts Auto Clean Mode, Auto Shut Off, Auto Grease Fire Detection Warning, an integrated woodchip smoker box, meat probes, and a USB fast charger for added convenience.

name: SAI-VDS: Victim Detection System with Reflection Control (Surveillance Camera System)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All
description: The Victim Detection System (VDS) integrates automatic reflection control into surveillance cameras to capture optimal images and enhance AI recognition. One of the most crucial factors in rescuing victims is the time it takes to locate them. However, surfaces like water and snow are highly reflective, making detection difficult. VDS addresses this issue by combining reflection control cameras with AI analysis.This technology is compatible with any camera, including single-camera systems, regardless of the manufacturer. For existing video surveillance systems, it can be easily implemented by simply replacing the cameras. It enables precise control of the light entering the lens or the human eye, allowing versatile applications in devices like smartphones, sunglasses, binoculars and scopes.

description: Samsung’s Bespoke Jet™ AI 400W is one of the world’s most powerful cordless stick vacuums, generating an unmatched 400 watts of suction power and delivering a run time of up to 100 minutes with a single battery. Plus, its streamlined All-In-One Station keeps the vacuum charged and automatically empties the dustbin without making a mess.

SBB1.5

Built on SAMSUNG SDI's world-class Energy Storage System (ESS) technology, SBB1.5 ensures maximum safety through battery-optimized fire-safety solutions and advanced integration technology. These features not only enhance system performance but also reduce total cost of ownership (TCO), ensuring stable operation of the ESS system and maximizing customer profitability.

name: SBMS for Lithium Battery Fire Extinguishment
description: The SBMS(Smart safe Battery Management System) we developed is the world's first product to integrate a fire extinguishing device, a smart safety feature, into the existing battery management system (BMS). Installed in battery packs for electric vehicles, ESS, and e-mobility using lithium batteries, it offers more than just overcharge and overdischarge protection and cell balancing. SBMS continuously monitors battery cell temperatures, and if abnormal heat is detected, it automatically releases CO2 to cool the cells and remove oxygen within the module. This effectively prevents thermal runaway and extinguishes fires, significantly enhancing the protection of human life and societal safety.

name: ScanWatch Nova Brilliant

With a phenomenal 30-day battery life, it offers powerful health scanning capabilities. Equipped with state-of-the-art sensors, it tracks vital metrics such as cardiovascular health, body temperature variation, activity, sleep, and respiratory function daily. Additionally, the Menstrual Cycle Guide allows you to track cycle symptoms, duration, and phases all in one place. This makes it an ideal choice for those seeking both elegance and advanced health monitoring in one device.

honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps

Available in three sleek options: Wallet Card, Keychain Tag, and Button Tag, this is the locator that looks good, fits just about anywhere, is easy to use, and works with iOS or Android devices.

The inspection results are automatically analyzed and managed in a digital space, making it an extremely efficient solution capable of reducing the need for analysis and management personnel by 100%

name: Skiin: Cardiac Monitoring Smart Garments

We have developed the first textile-based clinical-grade ECG monitoring platform. Our platform has been engineered to allow patients to start their care journey via a traditional 24-hour to 14-day Holter study, and seamlessly transition into a long-term monitoring program. This first-of-its-kind comprehensive cardiac monitoring solution includes Holter monitoring, continuous ECG, blood pressure, glucose, weight, SpO2, and temperature. With a machine learning based arrhythmia monitoring system, complex cardiac disorders can be identified earlier and managed more aggressively.

Current algorithmic approaches destroy sound quality by blindly cutting frequencies and compressing dynamic range. Creating 12 phantom speakers with wider coverage, every seat is the best seat in the house. Designed to complement, not compromise, the speakers can be wall-mounted or free-standing to offer convenience and style. It delivers an unmatched audio-visual experience, immersing you in every scene by supporting the latest formats that take all media to a whole new level. This innovation doesn't come at the expense of the environment as we’re committed to using less virgin plastic in products and packaging.

name: Sony XR Head-Mounted Display SRH-S1
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in XR Technologies & Accessories
description: High-Quality 4K per eye XR Head-Mounted Display and Controllers Dedicated to Interaction with 3D Objects.- An XR head-mounted display for diverse spatial content needs.- Delivers vivid realism with a 4K micro OLED panel.- Enables Mixed Reality creation with Video See-Through functionality.- Features the Snapdragon® XR2+ Gen 2 Platform, Qualcomm's latest XR processor.- Provides comfort and stability for extended use with optimized weight distribution and materials.- The flip-up mechanism allows for easy transitions between physical and virtual spaces.

name: Standing Rovo (SR) 733
description: The SR-733 is a groundbreaking massage chair featuring independently controlled arm and leg movement technologies, making it the first of its kind worldwide. This innovative technology enables a range of exercises and rehabilitation activities with the help of muscle relaxation and flexibility. It is particularly beneficial to the elderly for sit-down or stand-up from the chair safely and comfortably. The product is equipped with AI healthcare service functions and includes a wireless ECG holter to monitor biometric data for AI-based disease prediction and health assessment. This system provides home-based monitoring of cardiac conditions and stress levels, along with wellness recommendations.

name: Station for drone first responder
description: The station for DFR (Drone First Responder) isn't just an add-on; it's pivotal for achieving true autonomy in drone systems. Serving as an advanced drone base, it seamlessly integrates with police operation systems and autonomously obtains flight authorization, enabling drones to act as reliable, immediate responders in critical situations, extending beyond routine patrols to urgent incident response. The station also addresses battery limits, by extending flight capacity from a limited 30 minutes to uninterrupted missions. This innovation not only boosts productivity but also creates a new standard for drone reliability, ensuring responders are always ready for action. By ensuring seamless operations and maximizing uptime, the station enhances the efficiency and productivity of drones, making them a dependable solution for sustained, high-demand operations across various industries.

name: Stelo by Dexcom
description: Stelo is the first over-the-counter glucose biosensor cleared by the FDA in the US and is designed to empower people with Type 2 diabetes not using insulin and those with prediabetes to own their health. A small, wearable biosensor worn on the back of the upper arm, Stelo delivers continuous glucose readings to a user’s smartphone without fingersticks and is the easiest way to track glucose.

name: STM32MP25
description: The STM32MP25 is the Second-generation STM32 microprocessors enabling power efficient secure computing and advanced edge AI in connected industrial applications.

name: SWEAR Security
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All
description: SWEAR’s patented technology captures and protects digital content at the point of creation. This means every frame of a video, every sound bite, and every pixel is immediately secured with a unique cryptographic fingerprint (Digital DNA) and written into a blockchain ledger. Unlike traditional forensic methods that reactively work to identify fakes, SWEAR authenticates every piece of digital content from the start, ensuring a continuous chain of custody that cannot be tampered with.

name: Swift Edge 14 AI
description: The Acer Swift Edge 14 AI blends superior AI performance and a 14-inch 3K OLED display with an ultra-lightweight design for advanced mobile productivity. Powered by upcoming Intel Core Ultra processors (Series 2) with up to 50 percent faster Intel Arc graphics, users can expect unmatched performance for their computing tasks and can enjoy more than 300 AI-accelerated applications. The Swift Edge 14 AI’s combination of performance and features for on-the-go productivity are further complemented by its sleek, featherlight chassis weighing only 2.26 pounds. Plus, it delivers uninterrupted connectivity thanks to reliable and secure Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 5.4.

name: TCL 50 PRO NXTPAPER 5G
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps

name: TD Square, Tinnitus Digital Treatment Device
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Digital Health

name: TGV MICRO LED
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories

name: THE FREESTYLE AI+
honor: 2025 Best of Innovation in Video Displays

name: Therapeutic Spa Bed with AI Health Concierge
description: The Therapeutic Spa Bed with AI Health Concierge is a modular, bed-type medical device offering personalized health solutions through innovative AI technology and medical data integration. Its CeraCore Engine™ provides heat and massage, while hybrid low-frequency pads can be freely attached to any painful body part for muscle and nerve relaxation. It offers optimal mental and physical relaxation through sound, aroma, and light therapy. Integrated with the AI Health Concierge, an IoT-connected home Medicare platform, it enables everyday health management, prevention, prediction, and personalized medical services without time or space constraints.

name: ThinQ Dining
description: ThinQ Dining is a feature within LG’s ThinQ app that simplifies the menu selection and cooking process. By connecting all of the user’s kitchen appliances directly to recipes in a 3D visualization of each user’s actual kitchen, ThinQ Dining provides a new and efficient user experience. Users can select one of various recommended recipes to send to multiple devices, including ovens, ranges, and water purifiers. With a simple drag-and-drop, each device is automatically set to the settings required for preparing the perfect dish.

name: Three-Axis Micro Gimbal Stabilizer
description: The 3-axis Micro Gimbal Stabilizer (MGS) is the world's smallest 3-axis gimbal camera with up to ±8° compensation angle . The MGS is a patented motor structure consisting of only 4 ball bearings, which is much less than at least 12 ball bearings in the traditional 3-axis gimbal. The MGS can be embedded into various mobile devices, extending the exposure time by 16 times and enabling mobile devices to capture clear images even in low light and extreme conditions. With the latest 5G technology, our MGS enables sharp and smooth video live streaming for life-critical applications.

name: TMC EDGE: Thermal Edge AI Camera for Autonomous and More
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility

name: TooToon
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, Content & Entertainment
description: TooToon is a creative suite for storytellers, artists, and creators. It includes four tools: Fabulator for generating story ideas, Artifex for creating line-art from text, Marketplace for trading character models, and Anima for producing full-color illustrations. These tools help users develop stories, design characters, and create visuals quickly and easily. TooToon is ideal for anyone looking to streamline their creative process and bring projects to life, whether for webtoons, movies, games, or other media.

name: TOZO Golden X2 Pro
description: The TOZO Golden X2 Pro is the latest high-end true wireless in-ear earbuds from TOZO, featuring a dual-driver structure with dynamic and balanced armature drivers. The X2 Pro is upgraded with dual DACs, offering balanced low, mid, and high frequencies, and is certified with TOZO ORIGX Pro acoustics. It meets the high-quality audio demands of audiophiles. Additionally, the charging case features a new intelligent touchscreen with multi-touch support, providing rich information and UI interactions. The earbuds also support AI functions via the TOZO App, enabling face-to-face translation, instant transcription, meeting notes, and AI voice chatting.

name: Track Mate 3 Smart Bluetooth Tracker
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: The Track Mate 3 is a compact, credit card-sized smart Bluetooth tracker designed to work seamlessly with Apple's "Find My" network. It features wireless charging and a reusable design for sustainable use. The tracker is activated with a simple one-button operation, and a built-in speaker emits audible alerts to help track items over long distances. Additionally, a QR code on the back enables users to update their contact information and manage a digital business card, making it ideal for networking and assisting in the recovery of lost items.

name: Trailblazing Wheelchair: Conquering Obstacles
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All

name: TraXight
description: bitsensing’s Intelligent transportation system (ITS) solution, TraXight, applies radar data analysis to provide real-time traffic monitoring, including capturing critical statistics relating to traffic, problem diagnosis, big data insights and AI simulation-based signal optimization consulting services for smart cities. TraXight is a total package solution for ITS that monitors, collects and manages all the elements of data relating to intersection traffic, with the key benefit being that it helps to resolve urban traffic problems through previously unattainable insight and analysis.

name: TTcare Equine
honor: 2025 Honoree in Artificial Intelligence, Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: TTcare Equine revolutionizes horse health management with advanced AI technology. Our service begins with precise identification: veterinarians and handlers can effortlessly use a smartphone to capture a horse's unique features, and our AI instantly provides accurate identification data. Furthermore, we analyze video footage of a horse's gait to detect early signs of abnormalities. This early detection is crucial for preventing potential systemic diseases, offering a proactive approach to maintaining horse health.

name: Unified Cabin 2025
description: This next-generation automotive OEM solution offers full-cabin electronics from a single Garmin control module (ECU). It provides various entertainment and vehicle functions for each seat and automated wireless connectivity for all devices. Each occupant can connect a phone, headphones, and game controller. Features include new ways to create immersive customized profiles, six displays including the instrument cluster, zoned audio and voice assistant, streaming, gaming, Child Presence Detection (CPD) and Driver and Occupant Monitoring (DMS/OMS). Built on Android Automotive OS (AAOS) with many added Garmin innovations to support unique multi-user audio/video features, seamless device integration and user profile theming and customization.

name: UniWhale AI Baby Companion
description: UniWhale® is the world-first AI-driven baby care system which provides real-time monitoring of vital signs, predictive safety alerts, and personalized digital companionship. It offers comprehensive care from newborn to childhood, integrating physiological sensing and AI technology to ensure the highest level of safety and support for families. UniWhale® transcends the limitations of traditional monitoring, offering innovative solutions that adapt to the child’s development, providing peace of mind and convenience in everyday parenting.

name: Urban Bladeless Delivery Drone System
description: The Bladeless Drone is an innovative unmanned aerial vehicle that enhances safety and quietness through its bladeless propulsion technology. Its design eliminates propellers, reducing noise by over 40%, making it ideal for urban environments. Capable of carrying up to 10kg of cargo, it utilizes an AI-based smart flight system and smart air cargo system to safely and accurately deliver sensitive items like food and medicine in complex urban settings. Equipped with real-time monitoring, it tracks delivery routes and status. The Bladeless Drone presents a key solution for future logistics innovation.

name: URINE CHECK-ER (Cup-type Personal Urine Analyzer)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All

name: V2G AC home EV charger supporting AMI-based VPP solution
honor: 2025 Honoree in Sustainability & Energy/Power, Smart Home
description: Integrating V2G (Vehicle-to-Grid) Technology with VPP (Virtual Power Plant) in Smart Homes: This solution transforms electric vehicles (EVs) into integral components of the smart home ecosystem, enabling them to not only serve as transportation but also as energy storage units. By integrating with a VPP, EVs can interact seamlessly with home energy systems, optimizing electricity usage and providing backup power during peak times. Advanced technologies like AMI (Advanced Metering Infrastructure), DCU (Data Concentration Unit), and HES (Head-End System) make it possible for households to manage energy efficiently and participate in the energy market.

name: Vehicle mounted ESS charging system for charging AAM and EV
description: Our solution offers on-demand and on-site charging for electric vehicles, enabling charging anytime and anywhere, even when the vehicle stops or the battery is depleted due to environmental changes. This technology features an on-vehicle Energy Storage System (ESS) for emergency charging, which enhances accessibility and service reliability. It provides users with a convenient and flexible charging option, reducing dependence on traditional charging stations. By improving ease of use and minimizing opportunity costs, our system ensures that electric vehicle owners have a reliable charging method available in diverse conditions, making electric vehicle usage more seamless and efficient.

name: VET CAI
honor: 2025 Honoree in Pet Tech & Animal Welfare
description: VET CAI is the world's first EEG-based anesthesia depth meter developed exclusively for animals that tracks the level of consciousness during surgery and monitors the depth of anesthesia by indexing it. This helps prevent deaths from over-anesthesia or traumatic awakening during medical procedures. The main advantages over traditional EEG measurement methods are that it does not hurt the body (non-invasive), does not remove hair, and can safely monitor anesthesia in real time.

name: VIB Energy Tile: Specialized Indoor Energy Storage
description: The VIB Energy Tile is a pioneering energy storage system (ESS) built with the world’s first vanadium-ion battery, specifically designed for energy storage applications. Its advanced technology ensures exceptional longevity, achieving over 100,000 charge-discharge cycles, ten times more than other commercial batteries. The water-based, low heat mechanism minimizes fire and explosion risks, even during external fires. With a focus on eco-friendliness, the product’s simple design enables efficient manufacturing, easy disassembly, and high energy efficiency, making it a sustainable solution throughout its entire lifecycle.

name: VIRNECT VisionX
honor: 2025 Honoree in Industrial Equipment and Machinery

name: VO Invo Moon
honor: 2025 Honoree in Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility

name: Voice to Braille
description: Voice to Braille is a device that instantly converts spoken voice into Braille, allowing the 93% of visually impaired individuals who cannot read or write Braille to easily create, edit, and print Braille text without any additional training.Voice to Braille features a precise microphone system for accurate voice recognition and advanced AI that converts speech into both digital text and Braille data. The Braille data can be freely edited and output as audio through the device's hyper-directional speaker or transferred to other devices, including Braille printers, enhancing accessibility and seamless communication.

name: Vtoman Flash Speed Pro 3600
description: Vtoman Flash Speed Pro 3600 is a new type of smart charging station that features intelligent charging scene switching, smart algorithms, IP65 waterproof rating, ultra-low power consumption, and other technological characteristics, perfectly meeting the charging needs of the new era. This product is also equipped with exclusive LIFEBMS system and V-beyond technology, comprehensively ensuring the safety of product use and adapting to various charging requirements.

name: Wanna-Beauty AI: Virtual Makeup Powered by Generative AI
description: WANNA-BEAUTY AI is the first generative AI-based virtual makeup solution with voice interaction. This innovative technology combines AI face segmentation, large language models trained in makeup trends, and enhanced stable diffusion. Using voice recognition, it converses with consumers to interpret preferences and quickly derive optimal makeup keywords. The system applies virtual makeup using a proprietary stable diffusion model, providing realistic images. WANNA-BEAUTY AI understands consumer needs, suggests ideal makeup, and eliminates the need for physical trials or consultations. This world-first solution offers a personalized and efficient way to find the perfect look, streamlining the makeup selection process and enhancing satisfaction.

name: Watatumi: AI-powered Smart Fish Farm Software Suite
description: Watatumi is an AI-powered software suite for monitoring critical fish farming activities, including feeding, cage monitoring, and fish transferring. It features deep neural network models for fish counting, fishnet damage detection, and fish size estimation. These models, powered by innovative efficient neural network architectures, deployed on embedded chipsets near underwater cameras, eliminating the need to transmit large video data out of water, improving reliability, reducing costs, and simplifying integration. The algorithms consistently achieve high accuracy under varying  lighting, water, and weather conditions, and adapt easily to different camera setups. Watatumi significantly improves the efficiency and profitability of fish farming.

name: Water Saver 2
description: Water Saver 2 is a groundbreaking showerhead that transforms your shower experience while helping you make a positive impact on the environment and enjoy substantial savings on your water and energy bills within the first 12 months. Water Saver 2 boasts enhanced ergonomic, luxury, a refreshing splash-free performance jet, with now a set of digital services to go beyond customer’s experience. Experience the comfort of a traditional shower with significantly less water usage – a luxurious step towards a more sustainable and eco-friendly future

name: WE-STIM.MED™ MuscleGuard: Advanced Sarcopenia Brace
description: WE-STIM.MED™ MuscleGuard is an innovative solution designed for individuals seeking to prevent or rehabilitate muscle atrophy. This knee brace incorporates our proprietary energy harvesting technology, WE-STIM.MED™ (Wearable Electric Stimulation – Micro Electricity through Diversification), providing continuous micro-electrical stimulation to key muscle areas without any batteries or devices. It not only supports weakened muscles and joints but also activates muscle cells.

name: Wearable Mobility WIM
description: WIM is an innovative approach that optimizes the weight and functionality of wearable robots. WIM boasts a compact, unrestricted design with waterproofing, dustproofing, and replaceable batteries. It not only assists with safe and easy walking but also provides the right amount of force to the legs for effective exercise, like walking in water. Furthermore, it features trainer mode that allows for monitoring multiple users’ walking data, enabling customized coaching and exercise settings. Paired with AI cloud capabilities, it accumulates and reviews long-term exercise and musculoskeletal data positioning WIM as an AI driven personal trainer, tailoring programs specifically to your needs.

name: WheelAR(Walkway navigation for wheelchair users)
honor: 2025 Honoree in Human Security for All

name: WiiM Ultra
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories
description: The WiiM Ultra is a high-performance streaming device designed to deliver an unparalleled audio experience. Featuring a vibrant 3.5" full-color touchscreen, advanced connectivity options, and a wide range of inputs and outputs, it connects effortlessly with devices like turntables, TVs, headphones, AV receivers, and smart speakers. Supporting high-resolution audio and multiple formats, the WiiM Ultra integrates seamlessly with popular streaming services, providing users with exceptional clarity and depth in music, podcasts, and audiobooks. Its intuitive controls and versatile design make it an ideal addition to any smart home setup.

name: WIRELESS ONE CONNECT BOX
honor: 2025 Honoree in Audio Video Components & Accessories

name: Work and Play: Smart Display for Digital Inclusion
description: The Work and Play Smart Display is a cost-effective solution that transforms any Android smartphone into a complete PC or entertainment center. Targeted at low-income households and schools in developing regions, this 22"/24" display supports portrait and landscape mirroring, optimizing both work and play. With a magnetic phone clamp, USB-C, and multiple USB-A ports, it provides the connectivity needed in areas where broadband is limited and laptops are unaffordable. This smart display bridges the digital divide, making digital access more inclusive.

name: WYBOT S2 Solar Vision Robotic Pool Cleaner
description: The WYBOT S2 Solar Vision is the world's first wireless pool cleaning robot that autonomously returns to a solar-powered underwater charging station, completing a full cleaning cycle automatically, and performs high-efficiency cleaning with the help of visual technology.

name: X-RUNNER : A New Paradigm for the Metaverse Platform
XanderGlasses Connect
description: XanderGlasses Connect is wearable assistive technology designed to help people who struggle to hear or understand speech. Our first product, XanderGlasses, translates speech to text in real-time and projects accurate captions for the wearer. Our new product XG Connect adds functionality and features: AI text transformers to help wearers with cognitive challenges, captioning of environmental sounds (not just speech), 26 languages, cloud-based translation between languages, and a smartphone app for personalization. XanderGlasses Connect allows wearers to capture and store conversations which is helpful for seniors who want to record a medical or legal appointment to share information with family.

name: xMEMS µCooling
description: xMEMS µCooling (part number XMC-2400) is the first all-silicon fan-on-a-chip bringing active cooling to thin, AI-enabled mobile electronics. The 1mm-thin cooling chip generates airflow to actively cool devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, wireless chargers and SSD which are typically only passively cooled today.

name: XoMotion™
description: XoMotion™ is the world’s most advanced wearable robotic exoskeleton, designed to assist patients with mobility impairments due to spinal cord injuries, stroke, and other neurological conditions in standing up and walking. This lower-limb medical device offers unparalleled multi-directional locomotion support through self-balancing and hands-free functionality, enabling customizable and task-oriented robotic rehabilitation treatments across various stages of recovery. XoMotion™ not only enhances patient outcomes but also reduces cognitive load and physical strain on therapists in rehabilitation clinics. The technology has recently received Health Canada approval for sales in Canada and is currently undergoing clinical trials in the US for FDA approval.

name: XPG LANCER NEON
description: The XPG LANCER NEON DDR5 memory module is the world's first environmentally friendly RGB gaming memory module. It features an industry leading 60% illuminated RGB area and is made of 50% eco-friendly PCR materials, reducing carbon emissions by 72.5%. An IMR process further reduces environmental impact. This product also features an exclusive PCB heat dissipating coating that reduces heat by 10%.

name: XREAL One and XREAL One Pro
description: XREAL One and XREAL One Pro build on the success of the XREAL Air series, the world’s best selling AR glasses, giving consumers access to a next-gen spatial computing experience, adding a never-before-seen custom design using a built-in processor that offers a low latency 3DoF spatial screen experience regardless of source device. Giving users a massive screen with a FOV of up to 57-degrees, universal 120Hz refresh rate, an improved spatial speaker system from BOSE, and adjustable Inter Pupillary Distance ranges, XREAL One and XREAL One Pro also debut a unique RGB modular camera with multimodal AI support.

name: Yaber Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector K300s
description: Yaber Ultra Short Throw Laser Projector K300s combines cutting-edge technology to seamlessly integrate high-end projector into modern home living. Its leading Ultra Short Throw(UST) optical technology and JBL audio system deliver an unparalleled large-screen experience for home theaters. The ultra-high 950lm ensures clear, vibrant visuals even in daylight or well-lit environments, while the automatic focus and intelligent eye protection design enhance viewing comfort, creating an immersive audiovisual feast.

name: Yarbo
description: Yarbo (2024 Model) is an innovative modular robot designed to autonomously maintain yards and outdoor spaces year-round. Yarbo supports a modular design, enabling a variety of tasks such as mowing, leaf blowing and snow blowing, customizing to different weather conditions and maintenance needs. Leveraging AI and RTK-GPS technology, Yarbo navigates and operates independently with impeccable precision. Each unit can be controlled through a mobile device app, offering a convenient and customized user experience. The robot’s design prioritizes sustainability and is user-friendly, making Yarbo a competitive alternative to traditional lawn maintenance.

name: YLM-10LX 3D LiDAR sensor
description: The Hokuyo YLM-10LX is a state-of-the-art solid-state 3D LiDAR sensor tailored for industrial automation and service robotics. Created by Hokuyo, a prominent name in the LiDAR industry, it incorporates Lumotive's pioneering Light Control Metasurface (LCM™) technology, representing the forefront of programmable optics. This sensor delivers outstanding range, field of view, and reliability, all achieved without moving components. The YLM-10LX boasts precise, programmable scanning capabilities, ensuring reliable performance in dynamic settings. Its compact form and advanced optical beam steering make it the perfect option for applications that require top-notch 3D sensing and obstacle detection.

name: Z890 AORUS XTREME AI TOP
description: Built with superior power design, multi-GPU support, the flagship Z890 AORUS XTREME AI TOP motherboard can release the ultimate performance of the latest gen processor for gaming, overclocking, and local AI training. With exclusive AI TOP Utility, it can optimize AI training and fine-tuning while maintaining privacy and security. Featuring next-gen connectivity of WIFI7, dual 10GbE LAN, and the latest Thunderbolt 5 brings blistering network and connection, while the  DTS:X® Ultra audio creates an immersive gaming experience for gamers. DIY-friendly advancements like AORUS AI SNATCH, EZ-Debug Zone, WIFI EZ-Plug, EZ-Latch, and UC BIOS create friendly system building experience for users.

name: Zeos Audiva
honor: 2025 Honoree in Mobile Devices, Accessories & Apps
description: Zeos Audiva is the world’s first noise-cancelling directional microphone attachment for smartphones, featuring real-time noise-canceling technology for transmitting crystal clear audio in any environment. Plugs directly into your device’s type-C port – no Bluetooth required. Audiva is ideal for phone calls – both regular and speaker-phone, professional recordings, field reporting and virtual meetings. Its fixed mic-to-sound-source distance ensures optimal performance, eliminating virtually all noise that's over 9-12 inches away from the device. Sleek, portable and user-friendly, Audiva is designed to enhance the user’s audio experience – even in extremely noisy areas. It is compatible with Androids and iPhone 15/16 series,
